name: Coca-Cola FEMSA, S.A.B. de C.V.
description: Coca-Cola FEMSA, S.A.B. de C.V. is the largest franchise bottler of Coca-Cola products in the world by sales volume. Founded in 1976 and headquartered in Mexico City, Mexico, the company operates in several countries across Latin America, including Mexico, Guatemala, Colombia, Brazil, and Argentina. Coca-Cola FEMSA is dedicated to the production, distribution, and marketing of Coca-Cola beverages, serving a diverse range of products such as soft drinks, juices, water, and energy drinks. The company plays a vital role in the Coca-Cola system, focusing on sustainable practices and community engagement. Coca-Cola FEMSA emphasizes environmental stewardship, striving to reduce its carbon footprint and promote recycling initiatives. With a robust distribution network and a commitment to innovation, the company continues to adapt to changing consumer preferences, offering new products that cater to health-conscious consumers. Coca-Cola FEMSA's mission is to refresh the world and inspire moments of optimism and happiness while creating value for its stakeholders.
